hero.name: Abhinav Gupta
hero.heading: Hey! I'm Abhinav
hero.description: Hello! I'm Abhinav Gupta, a passionate programmer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from NSIT (now NSUT). Over the past nine years, I've honed my skills as a software engineer in small to mid-scale product startups.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR FULL STACK PROJECTS
about.description: My journey has taken me through the hills of backend programming, the rivers of UI and frontend development, the turbulent seas of DevOps, the valleys of AI, and recently, to the cloudy skies of engineering management. Working in technology fuels my inner curiosity to find the best solutions to any problem and execute them with precision. As a freelancer, I bring the same objectivity and dedication to my projects, collaborating with clients to achieve their goals in the cleanest and most efficient manner.

details.title: Website Design for Marketing Agency Startup
details.description: Developed a B2C learning app with a content management system designed to enhance student engagement. Role: Built the backend and CMS of the gamified learning app.

details.title: AI DICOM Viewer App
details.description: Radiolens is a DICOM viewer tool integrated with AI to assist radiologists in achieving better diagnoses.Role: Architected and led the development of the cloud PACS app, integrating AI tools and a DICOM viewer.

details.title: DCM Broker at Synapsica
details.description: A Flask application designed to securely transfer medical images from diagnostic centers using the DICOM protocol.Role: Developed the application to facilitate secure and efficient image transfers.

details.title: Student College Experience App and LMS
details.description: Developed an online teaching platform using AI personalization and assisted learning models to automate and enhance teaching. Role: Led AI integration and prompt engineering.

details.title: Application Development, SaaS Platform
details.description: A SaaS solution for small and mid-size wealth management firms, including projects for HDFC and the KOTAK Cherry app. Role: Led a team to deliver products to multiple clients, integrating with financial services and payment gateways.
details.langages: PHP, React, HTML, CSS, JS, node js

details.title: Sports Betting Application (Super4)
details.description: Developed a sports betting app with real-time odds, secure transactions, and scalable architecture. Role: Addressed scaling and security challenges for company applications.
details.langages: React, HTML, CSS, JS, node js

details.title: Digital Classroom Solution (Project MAX)
details.description: Created a digital classroom solution facilitating interactive learning experiences.

details.title: Network Monitoring Platform
details.description: A platform to monitor network devices in real-time using telemetry. Role: Served as a full-stack engineer, handling DevOps and product management.
details.langages: React, HTML, CSS, JS, node js

allService.title: Backend Development
allService.subTitle: Expertise: Server Side development, Databases, DevOps, Sockets, Networks, Monitoring. Technologies: ExpressJS, Deno, GraphQL, Flask, Docker, AWS, NoCode

allService.title: Frontend Development
allService.subTitle: Expertise: Creating end-to-end, responsive, and user-friendly websites and web apps. Technologies: ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, AngularJS, Bootstrap, NextJS

allService.title: Generative AI
allService.subTitle: Expertise: Machine Learning, AI integration into applications. Technologies: Python, LangChain, Fine-tuning, Chatbots, Prompt Engineering

allService.title: Wordpress/Wix Development
allService.subTitle: Expertise: Wordpress and Wix Website Development Technologies: wordpress, PHP, javascript, cloud APIs

allExperience.companyDescription: Neysa was founded with a clear purpose: to develop the ultimate tool tailored specifically to meet the needs of engineers.
BrightCHAMPS is a global live-learning ed-tech platform designed for children aged 6 to 16 to learn next-gen life skills, including Coding, Financial Literacy, Communication Skills, and Robotics.
Sunstone is a leading higher education service provider that works with academic institutions in up-skilling students for employability.
Valuefy is a premier investment management technology with cutting-edge solutions serving the leading financial institutions in India and across the world.

allTestimonial.reviewText: Working with you has been an absolute pleasure. Your backend architecture skills are top-notch, ensuring seamless data flow and scalability in our systems. The API design was incredibly efficient, and you went above and beyond to make sure everything was well-documented. Highly recommended!

I’m truly impressed by your frontend capabilities. The user interfaces you developed were not only visually appealing but also highly intuitive. Your knowledge of React, Angular, and advanced CSS was invaluable to our project. We couldn’t have delivered such a great user experience without your expertise.

Your work in generative AI blew us away. From designing intelligent models to deploying them seamlessly in our workflow, you demonstrated a deep understanding of AI frameworks. The solutions you delivered were both innovative and highly practical. We look forward to collaborating on future AI-driven projects.

sectionHeading.title: Let’s Discuss Your Project
sectionHeading.subTitle: Always available for freelancing if the right project comes along, Feel free to contact me.
